rules_text: Whenever Dunesea Dreadstalker or another nontoken creature you control dies, amass Soldiers 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It’s also a Soldier. If you don’t control one, create an 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
